Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks are 5-1 against division opponents and score 117.2 points per game, outscoring opponents by 6.7 points per game.
The Raptors are 5-17 in conference play and lead the Eastern Conference with 12.4 offensive rebounds per game, averaging 3.7 from Jakob Poeltl.
The Raptors are shooting 46.2% from the field, 0.3% lower than the Knicks' opponents' 46.5% shooting this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for Wednesday, January 8th, 7:30 p.m. EST.
The Knicks are aiming to stop a three-game skid.
